Post-Match Reflections: The Texas Rangers celebrated the team's first-ever championship after the World Series
Miscellaneous Highlights: The World Series between the Rangers and the Arizona Diamondbacks notched the lowest viewership totals of any World Series since records have been kept, going back to the 1960s
Others: The five games averaged 9.1 million viewers, down from the previous low of 9.8 million in 2020
